divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the telephone at my home in West Liberty, Ky. It was a warm summernight and I could hear all of the crickets chirping in the small valley in whichI lived. I was sitting on my bed looking out through my window as I noticed aglow entering our valley. It approached from straight across my window ourhouse was halfway up the other hill which made up the valley. I watched itslowly descend to around 20 ft. from the ground. There was no noise eminatingfrom the object. I could still hear the crickets chirp. I told the otherperson I was on the phone with that I thought I was witnessing a UFO... Onething I did notice... no acceleration, no deceleration... it just stopped as ifI hit pause on a VCR tape. Then it hovered for around 10 seconds and shot downthe valley southward again with no noise, no acceleration... just still toincredible speed in a nanosecond. The object was a slightly flattened sphereabout 15-20 ft. in diameter. It was a cyan color or sky blue with a constantaura surrounding it. There was no other detail to it.The other witness to this event I met at school the next day. I didnt tellanyone except my family they all didnt believe me of course... I just happenedto run into him as he was telling this tale about an object he had seenstreaking across the sky at about the same time I experienced it. He describedit in detail as exactly what I saw. All of this BEFORE I mentioned a word toanyone there. This is my story. I have not seen one since and did not believeuntil this sighting. I am not saying its extraterrestrial... its justunidentified. Nothing Ive ever seen in aviation to this day.
